item.title: ‘Mr. Scorsese’ Documentary Series Sets October Premiere Date as Apple TV+ Unveils First Clip
item.description: Apple TV+ will premiere its Martin Scorsese documentary series, “Mr. Scorsese,” on Oct. 17. The five-part documentary event about the legendary filmmaker comes from acclaimed director Rebe
